p: Animal samples were collected from pigs and poultry on the farm at enrollment and follow-up. Pig nasal swabs and sera were collected from all age groups including piglets, weaners, growers, finishers, sows, and boars. The number of pigs sampled was proportionate to herd size with all animals sampled from small herds (< 10 pigs) and up to 15 animals sampled from herds with > 10 pigs.
